item.title: Collecting Hugo static site statistics using Azure Application Insights
item.description: Welcome back! About a month ago, I decided to move my former 007FFFLearning website from Wix.com to something “easier” to use for blog writing. While Wix is an excellent platform, offering an easy way to build a graphical website, besides a ton of plug-ins, it also comes with a cost. And since I didn’t have a need for a lot of the built-in features I was using out of my own business before I joined Microsoft, I wanted to try something new.
